price: 71. Nabii Luut tamah Yi sayyok sinni caagid yagdubeeh abam faxa шага tekkeenik ken digbisita, Yalli caraamu abem maabina lab maral orobtaanamal keenik iyye.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
